original_text: Joab had been the leader of Israel's army. But now Absalom had chosen Amasa as leader instead of Joab. Amasa's father, Jether, was a descendant of Ishmael. He had married Abigail. She was Nahash's daughter and a sister of Zeruiah, Joab's mother.
korean_text: 압살롬이 아마사로 요압을 대신하여 군지휘관으로 삼으니라 아마사는 이스라엘 사람 이드라라 하는 자의 아들이라 이드라가 나하스의 딸 아비갈과 동침하여 그를 낳았으며 아비갈은 요압의 어머니 스루야의 동생이더라

sentences.original_text: Joab had been the leader of Israel's army.
But now Absalom had chosen Amasa as leader
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 압살롬은 아마사를 지도자로 선택했다.

sentences.original_text: and a sister of Zeruiah, Joab's mother.
